name: Surprise Strike
text: You actually seem to do more damage when frantically trying to avoid your enemies.
prerequisites: Cautious Fighter, Desperate Swing, base attack bonus +6, halfling.
benefit: Once per day, when fighting defensively or making an attack of opportunity while taking the total defense action with the Desperate Swing feat, you take no penalty on the attack roll.
staminaText: After you have used this feat once, you can spend 5 stamina points to use it additional times per day, at a cost of 5 stamina points per use.
text_zh: 你疯狂地试图避免被打中时对敌人造成了更大的伤害。
prerequisites_zh: 谨慎战斗，绝望打击，BAB+6，半身人。
benefit_zh: 每天1次，当你在进行防御式战斗或借机攻击中使用“绝望打击”专长，你的攻击检定不受到“绝望打击”的额外-4惩罚。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用过一次这个专长后，你可以消耗5点耐力来在当天额外使用一次该专长，每次使用将会5点耐力。
